Research and Project Overview

AnalyzingWeb Application Vulnerability of Educational Institutions in Bangladesh This study aims to detect vulnerabilities of the educational websites in Bangladesh and analyze which scanning tool provides more accurate results. Contrast Enhancement of Low Light Image Here we discussed about enhancement of different low light images using Histogram Equalization (HE) and Illumination Adjustment. Krish-e An e-platform for farm mechanisation to improve food security and livelihood.User can make purchases an also sell their Agri-related commodities on this app. Puran-o PURAN-O is an online second hand book selling and buying app. In this application anyone can open an account where he can upload his copy of book to sell . Similarly, if anyone wants to buy any copy , he can just search it using his account. Jontro It is an e commerce App named jontro. Here an user can see available items, add items to cart, increase the quantity, empty the cart or proceed to checkout. In checkout we need to provide address details. After payment will get a confirmation. Student Database This is a complete student database application. It uses token bases authentication by generating a jwt token for token. Calculator This application runs regression testing and mutation testing on a simple calculator app. UI/UX Some UI prototype designed by me.
); }; export default Product;
